head.title: shared-db
head.subtitle: Let the user choose where to store their data
head.description: For end-users have the freedom to choose where to put your data: on Google Drive, on ownCloud, ... For developers one database for sharedâ€¦

body:
For end-users

  • have the freedom to choose where to put your data: on Google Drive, on ownCloud, ...

For developers

  • one database for shared editing, offline mode, and other complex things.

For cloud-platforms

  • Any platform can host data generated by applications using shared-db.
